website_summaries.verdict: This power bank is permitted in carry on bags and reliably charges smartphones, tablets, laptops, handheld gaming systems, and other electronic devices.
pros: Under the 100 watt limit, so can travel in carry-on luggage
Purchase includes variety of USB cord accessories and travel pouch
Considering its 26800 mAh, power bank is not heavy
Can completely recharge cell phones an impressive 3 to 4 times
cons: Power bank may become slightly warm when charging for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Real PD power bank! Works great on pixel phone and MBP w/ touchbar (test in photo)!
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks. Charges itself and other devices extremely fast using PD standards. Charges my phone (pixel - "charging rapidly") and my laptop (13" MBP Retina - tested at 31W) faster than any other battery pack I've found. I've attached a screenshot of the MBP charging test for those of you out there looking for more concrete evidence of the charging rate of this device. Only warning is make sure you research when you buy additional cables since not all of the USB-C cables support PD.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly, unreasonably restrictive warranty.
customer_reviews.text: The USB-C port stopped working within two months of light use. Decided to get it replaced, only to find that warranty repair requires products be packaged in the original box, complete with "all components, manuals, and registration cards." No reasonable person would keep the box and manual for a sub-$100 product around for several months just in case. If you stand by your products, stop putting unreasonable restrictions on your warranty. I've never seen another company with requirements like this.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Also the power output is the best I've seen on a portable battery
customer_reviews.text: The big attraction here is the full USB c integration. Being able to charge the battery itself then with the same cable charge your phone, is a huge deal. Also the power output is the best I've seen on a portable battery. It can actually charge my Dell XPS 13 laptop. One battery and one cable, can quick charge both my phone and laptop. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick L.

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Does what its suppose to do! Obviously it will charge any low power tablets and phones you have that use USB or USB C. However It also charges the XPS 13 9360, a laptop. one charge takes it from 20-85% in about 1.5 hours. Obviously will not charge it all the way since it only puts 30w out through USBC, but it'll buy you 6-7 hours from 85% charge + 1-2 hours that it charged while your computer was running light videos and word documents. That's pretty good in my book, and it has more capacity than the dell power companion to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product was great at first. Fast charging and I used it everyday. Battery pack will no longer take a charge and lights are all dead on it
customer_reviews.author: H.TA

customer_reviews.title: Less than half the capacity claimed.
customer_reviews.text: Less than half the capacity claimed. Can't even charge an iPad Pro once. Ipad Pro is 10,000mah. No response from support after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Thanku4playing

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't charge from USB when USB-C device connected
customer_reviews.text: Whether this will work for you depends on how you want to use it. It will charge my Surface Go tablet via the USB-C port just fine, but if I connect a USB charger to the Power Bank at the same time, it won't charge the Power Bank. I have to disconnect the Surface Go from the USB-C port and then I can charge the Power Bank either from the USB-C port or the Micro-USB input port. Some Power Banks have TWO USB-C ports so that they can charge and be charged at the same time, but this isn't one of those, so it really won't work for me. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: BrownInTown

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: It actually drains my Macbook to charge itself, instead of charging my Macbook. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Beaupain

customer_reviews.title: Large battery, easy to use, but not Macbook friendly
customer_reviews.text: Charges all my phone, headsets, watch, everything perfectly with quick charge and all that jazz as advertised, however it stated it holds enough juice for 1 full charge on a Macbook, unfortunately from a dead battery and completely off, my MacBook only got around 22% of juice and took 5 hours at least to get to that point. I had bought this because of the MacBook charging. I won't return it, still, a decent unit to have for my phones and iPad, just need to find another one for my Mac
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Well made and thoughtfully designed power bank
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable charger! I think it is a nice feature that all of the plug ports are on one side of the device, it is just easier to find a spot to plug something into it when your charger is in a bag or pocket. All of the wires run the same way and that is nice. The construction of the charger is excellent, it is plastic but very solid. The Ravpower is better than the PowerAdd charger in its construction. I’m glad I listened to a friend’s recommendation and got the Ravpower portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: E. Glover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic charging power WHILE using devices!
customer_reviews.text: The charging power of this piece is outstanding! I bought it to charge my Nintendo Switch while still playing it, and it definitely does that. Same with iPad and iPhone; charges then WHILE using the device. The only thing I’d note is that this is definitely a brick. It’s not small, tho it is pretty sleek and I like the travel case they provide, but it’s also relatively heavy compared to other, (albeit) less powerful, chargers I've had. So that makes sense. Overall, it’s still a 5 star product for me because it charges exactly the way I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: UGADawg2006

customer_reviews.title: Bad execution
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Micro USB charger days were over when I found this portable charger. But no!!!!! You still have to keep your micro USB cable just to charge this. Thats horrible!!!!! Why can't this device be charged with a USB C charger as well? Its 2019 and they are still making devices to that receive power from Micro USB???? Another issue is it charges my 13 inch mac but not my 15 inch windows laptops. The power output is way too low. Bad investment.
customer_reviews.author: Djmeechymeech

customer_reviews.title: Actual weight and dimensions given here
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived, I was surprised at how bulky it is. I measured and weighed the beast. Here are the proper weight and dimensions: * weight: 1.03 lb (NOT 0.83 lb) * length: 6.8" * width: 3.2" * height: 0.9" The weight and dimensions listed in the product description on October 2019 have nothing to do with reality. Disappointing. FYI, the battery arrived about 38% charged, and topped up in about 5 hours on a regular non-PD USB-A charger. [EDIT] Customer support contacted me and tried their best to mitigate: that is really astounding. I am boosting this review to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: camisdad

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for several months now and it works great. I like how the USB-C works as both input and output. It even charges my 2019 Macbook Pro 13. Only downside I've noticed (which is similar for many such chargers) is for accessories with very low draw (like bluetooth earpieces), the draw must be so low that the charging unit thinks there is no draw at all and turns itself off after a minute or so. So to charge such devices, I need to plug in a higher draw item like a phone to keep the charger on so it will charge the bluetooth earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tobin

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Enough battery to use several days! And it is strong enough! Not easy to break! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Zhang Guotai

customer_reviews.title: RAVPOWER Support Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March 2018, in Aug of this year my battery pack exhibited vastly reduced capacity and charging power. I contacted support and after some troubleshooting they sent me a gratis replacement unit. I was not under the extended warranty, and they didn't require me send the old unit back. They just replaced with a new unit free of charge in quick order. This is the kind of support I can get behind, going above and beyond!
customer_reviews.author: Eric in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Good external power bank for the price....
customer_reviews.text: This is one of three different power banks I own. It does the job and the build quality is excellent. I would give it a 5 star if the charging and discharging are better or faster. So this is real feedback from someone who has multiple external power banks. It's almost perfect. The $60 price tag is reasonable (when I purchased this item), but there is currently an extra $15 discount coupon right now which is even better!
customer_reviews.author: Roger Chan

customer_reviews.title: doesn't charge well with the fast charge cable
customer_reviews.text: doesn't charge my iPhone with the fast charge usb-c cable.. disconnects after a minute. maybe there is something wrong with this unit
customer_reviews.author: purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Preliminary on the overall rating, subject to upward revision - So far so good except
customer_reviews.text: I'm still in the process of seeing how this works out over time charging things. Too soon to be sure it's all good. The only problem for sure I've found so far is that the longer 11/2 foot USB cable doesn't seem to function. I'll be asking for a replacement of that. Update - Amazon replaced the whole package and the new version includes a working foot and a half cable. Now I need to send in the original version, which I'll get to this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: Everything I wanted and more!
customer_reviews.text: I not only wanted a power bank but a fast charging one and ho boy does this thing deliver! (Note. Only the USB-C [power delivery] does fast charging) I've charged my phone twice to 100% without recharging the bank and it charged my phone in a timely manner! I can truly leave the house and not worry about running out of power. I switched from a removable battery phone where I bought spare batteries just in case, to a phone with a non removable battery. I was concerned that I would be dead in the water if not conveniently around an outlet. With this power bank, I can fully say, I no longer have to worry. 10/10 great product here.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Died after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for 4 months, them it just died. It won't charge or charge anything.
customer_reviews.author: dustan

customer_reviews.title: Has stopped auto charging connected device after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one of which I gave to a friend. Haven't used mine that often so far. My friend's powerbank has however been misbehaving after a month of use. It won't autochage an iphone anymore when connected. You have to press the button on the powerbank so it will start charging. Have tried different cables and phones but same issue. Other than that, good build, heavy and charges under 9 hours with a 30w usb-c wall charger.
customer_reviews.author: Smeet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. As advertized
customer_reviews.text: Via 30w fast charge (USB-C), this device charges from dead in about 5 hours... It provides me with enough power for about 4 days of heavy cell phone use (facebook, web searches, streaming video, editing photos, etc) The build quality is excellent. The only thing that i would like changed would be an LCD readout so that you know the exact power level, vs the 4 LED lights (each light represents 6,700MaH)
customer_reviews.author: Mike 5

customer_reviews.title: MUST READ BEORE BUYING
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new power bank because I lost the one I had I did my home work and i though I would give this one a try and it’s really good It comes with 2 usb fast charging ports a Micro and a type c When I first charged it with the micro it would take more then 24 hours but with both charger connected it it fully charged with in 3 This will last you days I took this in a trip and did not need to charge it one because it help so much juice It is a little heavy but for the per it’s good
customer_reviews.author: Aaqib

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great power bank that provides extended power for all my devices. It is a hefty unit, at 6.8" x 3.2" and almost a pound in weight. But, I don't notice it inside a backpack. I primarily use it on day trips. With 26800mAh, it stores a lot of power. I've been able to charge 2 tablets, 2 phones, and a camera several times during the course of 3 days on one charge. That's impressive! It recharges fairly quickly. The unit is well built of hard plastic material. My only complaint is that the led status lights are difficult to see in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Kalibr

customer_reviews.title: Holly mother of power source!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to charge your phone SEVEN TIMES from a single battery back that will easily fit in your pocket??? If yes than this is for you! Lol anyways I'm really impressed by this power bank and I use it every day! I only use it for the usb c power delivery port and it charges my phone in no time! It comes with a really neat carrying bag that is cool to touch. I would most definitely recommend this to anyone who doesn't want to sell there kidney for one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Иiск Р

customer_reviews.title: Ravpower brings the heat
customer_reviews.text: Went with this instead of Anker’s 26800 powerbank for the cost and was not let down. Since I already had a 30w pd charging brick, I decided to pick ravpower. Powerbank is like a brick but it’s got power for days. Took this on a weeklong trip to California and had this power two pairs of usb c earbuds, an S9+ and an xs max and only charged the powerbank back up to full when I came back at the end of the week. This thing is heavy but that’s to be expected. It’s a powerhouse. Ravpower is good quality 🤙🔥
customer_reviews.author: Angel Soler

customer_reviews.title: I really like this, make sure get the anker BATTERY CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: this works! like really well, its not too heavy and it has fast charging using PD usb type c ! but make sure you get the anker PD 45 watt charge to charge this up! it will charge the battery in like 3 and a half hours, and it charges a NOTE 8 using fast charge in 1 hour and 38 mins and it will do it 5 to 6 times,
customer_reviews.author: The TROUBLESHOOTER

customer_reviews.title: Charges USB-C Powered Laptops like HP Spectre
customer_reviews.text: Using it with HP Spectre x360 13" Laptop. The Powerbank supplies 30 Watts power to the laptop and charges even when the laptop is ON. I have read some reviews that it only charges Spectre notebook while it is off, which is not true. The power bank doesn't get too hot while being used or charged. It is a little bulky since it is 26.8 Ah. The Powerbank charges faster if you charge it with a USB-C 30 W or higher charger. I charge it with my Spectre Notebook 60 W Power Supply.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Expensive paper weight
customer_reviews.text: It was great and useful until it died. This was expensive and I had anticipated it would meet my requirements. Initially it did and then after about 15 months it stopped working. Of course this happened just after it was outside of the support window. I would strongly recommend looking at alternatives and to consider this product a short term solution to your requirements.
customer_reviews.author: joseph carey robertson

customer_reviews.title: Holds ALOT of charges! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I travel alot and use my phone ALOT! I currently own the samsung note 8. It charges my phone 4 times on completely dead. It is on the heavy side but I'll take it for the charges it holds. I will say my samsung charger that came with my phone charges the battery bank up completely in 20 hours on dead. You can purchase the anker type c to type c plug like I did. It charges the bank completely on dead in 6 hours. I've had battery banks forever. This on that's the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Berndt

customer_reviews.title: Good but Will break sooner rather than later
customer_reviews.text: Edit: have offered to send a new one to replace the one that had broken but have not yet received the new one so we will have to see if it will work as well This product was great in charging my phone, ipad and switch but the longevity on this this is lacking. I had this product for 4 Months and it stopped charging which is really not good for a battery pack. For the price that I paid I expected it to last long. I would not recommend if you care about not buying a 77 dollar product every 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Obianuju Akaniru

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Power Pack!!!
customer_reviews.text: Here's what I did... Bought a snap-on cover for the Switch and placed industrial velcro on the removable case and on this battery so it's not permanently attached to the switch. It's considerably heavier as the battery weighs more than the Switch. I've charged my switch 3 times from less than 10% and still had enough power to charge my phone. Fit's inside my Switch Backpack. Takes a while (10 hours) to charge up from almost empty. Overall, I'm more than happy with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: N. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and capacity and supports both USB connectors
customer_reviews.text: Tons of capacity and all the connectors I need. I've been a RAVPower customer for a long time, they always deliver quality and value and this is no exception. There aren't many batteries which have USB-A and USB-C connectors but given my phone needs one and both my wife's phone and my camera need the other this was the perfect combo for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Knopf

customer_reviews.title: Good Battery Bad Accessories
customer_reviews.text: The power bank itself is great! Haven't had any issues with it. I use it to charge my Pixel 3a XL, my wireless ear buds. It even charges my Nintendo Switch up while playing. The accessories are lacking though. All of the included cables are quite short, but my biggest complaint is that the mesh bag/case that comes with it is too small for the battery pack. Can't give this five stars but would recommend the product if you can deal with the poor accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Finley

customer_reviews.title: Good for house fires?
customer_reviews.text: Charging was great when it worked. I haven't had this too long and I'm irritated its already not charging/dead. Update: Still charges with whats left but the port c pd melted when I tried plugging a ravpower pd from the wall into the power bank... I noticed the end of the c cable plugged into the c port of the power bank was hot and realized there to be a malfunction... the bank was pushing out a charge and the wall pd plug was trying to charge the power bank.... reaching out to support right now... will update after they get back...
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Probably more like 4.5 Stars..
customer_reviews.text: Great bank! Already knew it would be since i have hike a smaller older version the planet.. it has become one of my essentials. The reason it didn't get 5 stars Is due to the lack of an indicator (light?) as to what direction the usb-c is flowing. This is inconvenient because i charge a very delicate important device and dont want it to draw out power from the device.. there very well might me a safeguard to prevent this, but regardless id like a light that changes colors for in/out.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Decent power bank for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. Had it for 3 months now with no issue. I can tell from the overall materials and the port that this won’t be the longest lasting of power banks (plastic is on the cheap side, and putting cables into the ports isn’t the smoothest of experiences), but it gets the job done. Don’t get me wrong - this will last me just fine at least a year, I just know that if I would’ve spent for a $250+ I’d get better long term durability.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Consumer

customer_reviews.title: 'Charges' my HP Envy x360
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an international trip where I wasn't sure how often I'd have access to power. I didn't need it much but was comforting to have along. It worked perfectly keeping my HP Envy x360 15.6" laptop charged (it didn't actually charge the laptop while on but kept it from discharging) but it worked so I was very happy. It charges the laptop if it is in standby or off. It also worked to charge my 2 phones and iPad. I was very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Josh454

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant addition to my EDC bag. Charged Kindle/Chromebook/phone/headphones/ Switch/watch between days in Iceland (forgot to bring a wall adapter and only had one to share among group. Lasted me days easily). Always keep it in my backpack and charge it at work. Love this thing. If your work relies on you having power, you should have this.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Caron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome battery pack for all your devices
customer_reviews.text: This thing lasts a LONG time if you are just charging your cell phone. Works well on a Nintendo Switch and Google Pixel Slate as well. You can charge the power bank via USB C, which is nice because of the high capacity of the device. A bit heavy, but really not bad if you compare the size/weight to smaller capacity devices and then think about the mAh's.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyd

customer_reviews.title: A Definite Need for Mobile Musician’s
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 the price of competitors,AWSOME,works on all my iOS devices,do yourself a favor,get the matching wall plug/w two extra smart USB ports as well as usb-c fast charge protocol,LASTS FOREVER,a little weighty but worth it,also you’ll need a hermit case to protect it if you’re a backpacker
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Rogofsky

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Nintendo switch
customer_reviews.text: This charger is ideal for charging the switch while playing. Many other units don’t have enough kick to raise the battery level while playing but this charger has more than enough wattage. Used it on an overseas flight. Played the entire flight and arrived with 100% battery on the switch and plenty of juice to spare in the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value, fast charge for days
customer_reviews.text: Been awesome so far. I use its usb.c to fast charge my Samsung s10 over and over and over and over. Seriously I could keep going. Its bomb and recharges FAST. WIN WITH THIS. I have tried every other brand and thought I'd never leave the last one but for some reason gave them a try and im a lifer.
customer_reviews.author: CNote3030

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this battery pack for my last hunting trip and also plan to use on vacations. I've owned many others in the past but this one beats them hands down. On my hunting trip I recharged my phone for 5 days, multiple times a day due to no signal. I probably got 10 or so charges put of it and the pack still showed 2 bars of charge. I highly recommend this. It is bulky and I do suggest the carrying case to organize cords and the ability to clip the case to your belt or bag. Charges fast also using the usb c port.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz Lindstrand

customer_reviews.title: Cannot charge fully (1st); The rest functions are okay (2nd)
customer_reviews.text: I got this for holiday travel. It looks heavy-duty, but I have a very hard time to charge the battery in full. I have tried multiple times to charge it overtime via its own wall outlet. The next morning (almost 14 hours), it is still only charged halfway. I have a feeling even I have a defect product. 01-20-2020 I used it for a longer time, and want to leave another review. The product is not terrible after it could be charged the phone easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect battery bank for Nintendo Switch owners.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking to drastically extend your play time with your Switch while away from an outlet/dock, I highly recommend this. I also would highy suggest you pick up a USB C charger to quickly charge this battery. I personally got this one.
customer_reviews.author: HURG

customer_reviews.title: It is only useful for using it with the Power Bank because it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works on my 2016 MacBook Pro 13" with two USB-C ports. Wish the cord was longer. It is only useful for using it with the Power Bank because it is only 36". I can't use it with my RAVPower charger (bought them as a bundle) because it won't reach the charger when it is plugged into the wall. It would get five stars is the cord was 5' long! We have two other RAVPower power banks that we use with our devices and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chienmauvais

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I bought it almost a year ago. It was able to charge my laptop and my phones with no issues. The amount of juice this battery pack provides is astounding! However, recently my battery pack stopped recharging. But to my great delight I contacted RavPower support and they sent me a brand new one! If you are worried about the customer service of RavPower, DONT BE! RavPower offers excellent products and customer service. I would recommend this product and brand to anyone. You cannot go wrong with this battery pack, or any RavPower product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: compact design with 26,800 mAh capacity & quick charge.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this RAVPOWER battery bank, 1) the 2 USB ports support fast charge, each port is 2.4A. 2) the USB Type C port can be use for fast charge supported USB Type C Smart Devices. 3) I love the compact design with huge battery capacity of 26,800 mAh. 4) It also support quick recharge when you dual charge the battery bank with RAVPOWER 61W Wall Charger, utilizing both USB Type C & Micro USB port on the battery bank to recharge with wall charger under 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: IanIanCHen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these products and bought 2 for friends. It is a must have as part of your personal business continuity plan. It hold charge for long periods and keeps your phone and other devices online. I go nowhere without it. Good product and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Patos

customer_reviews.title: Will not constantly charge any device
customer_reviews.text: The first charger I received will not continually charge any device. It constantly goes in and out of charging mode. If I tap the button it charges for a few seconds and then goes off. If I hold the button for 5-10 seconds it will charge for a bit longer but will not stay on. Very frustrating. I will be receiving a replacement and I hope this one actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB-C port broke within two months found the return policy ...
customer_reviews.text: USB-C port broke within two months found the return policy to be unusually restrictive. I was not able to return without every single piece of paper that it came with.
customer_reviews.author: jon fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great charger. Weighs a ton.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Very powerful. Long battery storage life. Charges fast on my Chromebook charger. Charges my Pixel2 VERY fast. The problem I have with it is it's weight. It's 15.6 oz and that is a lot when your going in the backcountry or even when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: M & M

customer_reviews.title: Solid portable battery pack
customer_reviews.text: Good battery pack for charging a variety of devices. Haven't measured the speed for quick-charge like behavior but good enough for regular charging whilst traveling. Also worked for my Surface Book 2 and Nintendo Switch. Took 1 star because one of the micro-usb cables stopped working a day after I received the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: An incredible battery bank - purchased this for my bicycle to charge my phone/accessories on-board
customer_reviews.text: This is really a quality battery bank. It take quite a while to fully charge, but I can keep my Galaxy S7 charged for literally DAYS when the battery bank has a full charge. Works very well, recommended!
customer_reviews.author: WolfX5

customer_reviews.title: It Finally Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well after 8 months I finally have a battery that can power my Dell XPS 12 9250! It's been a long journey trying to find a portable battery, but this one works. My Dell is powered only by Thunderbolt 3, so if you have a device that is only powered by Thunderbolt 3 and you can run or charge off of a 30 W battery give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Family of 5

customer_reviews.title: A little confusing, but does work with Dell XPS 13
customer_reviews.text: After a bit of research looking for an external battery that would charge my Dell XPS 13 9350, I took a risk and bought this bank. It DOES charge, but you'll have to play with it a bit, pressing the power button a few different ways to get the bank in the right mode. Be patient, and watch the laptop's charging light. It doesn't charge super fast, but it DOES work.
customer_reviews.author: Rosangela Canino Koning

customer_reviews.title: Occasionally drains phone battery when doing USB-C to USB-C
customer_reviews.text: I have a Nexus 6p and I bought RAVPower 26800 because it could do USB-C to USB-C. The thing I am annoyed about is it has a tendency to start draining my phone's battery. I end up having to keep an eye on it in order to use it as a battery and not as a means of draining my phone's battery faster.
customer_reviews.author: Juda

customer_reviews.title: Comes with bag to put it in.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Charges phone really fast. Haven't had it long enough to know how many times it will charge a phone before it dies. The look and feel is perfect. It comes with 2 micro USB cords one is 6in and the other is like 12in. Also comes with a new type c cord as well.
customer_reviews.author: Wayman Paul Jr

customer_reviews.title: Battery Pack Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I received a smaller battery pack made be this company (as a gift) and was happy when it was just me using. With a family of four cell phones dying at the same time, we needed a battery pack the had more umph. The only draw back is how heavy the pack is but it’s waaaay worth it. This is also great for teens that complain that their phones are always dying. I still haven’t found a way to charge my lap top but the iPad’s work great. This is the only company I trust to buy battery packs from and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great go-to Charger!
customer_reviews.text: Whether you need to charge your phone or your USB-C powered laptop, this portable charger meets the need! It's compact, charges quickly, and holds a charge for an exceptional period of time - forgot your MacBook power brick at home? No worries, just plug into this charger and you're good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Black

customer_reviews.title: A Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just charged 3 drained GoPro Batteries in 1 hour and a half this power bank rocks!!! and my cellphone was charged on it yesterday and the power bank is still showing all led lights which means the power bank itself is still fully charged! Its not super light weight but it will sure do the job and feel High Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Yup007

customer_reviews.title: Huge capacity. Charges fast.
customer_reviews.text: With light usage, this kept my phone charged for two weeks straight. With a 30W charger, it charges in 4.5 hours. And it charges my phone quickly. Never got hot. Just be aware that it is a little heavy. Fine for a backpack, but heavy for a purse.
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: works for our phones
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance because he had a convention in Cali. It made it through airport security with no issues. It charges our phones fine.. but I bought it for his computer. We've followed the directions for charging a larger item and it doesn't work. It just says that his computer is charging the battery pack, instead of the other way around. It could be that its not compatible I suppose. I'm not the tech savvy one, but he is and he couldn't figure it out. We'll keep it for the phones at least.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power. Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This isn't your typical power bank -it's large, durable, and has tons of charge. I brought this with me on my trip to the lake this weekend, and this thing fully charged my iPhone 6s 4 times, along with a couple of GoPros. Even after all that this bad boy could probably revive my iPhone 4 more times. This also comes with an soft pouch that snugly fits the entire power bank. This is useful because it protects the ports from being contaminated with dust and other particles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Luong

customer_reviews.title: Portable Stored Power! It is a sexy beast! Honest.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little brick. I use it all the time. I don't charge my phone in an outlet when I sleep anymore, but if I'm in bed, and my phone battery is low, this brick saves the day. On a 6 hour Greyhound bus trip, this brick helped me keep my Nintendo Switch gaming going. Its weird, but I love the power bank. The perfect size, packed with a lot of power. I even sometimes plug my PS4 controller into it when my battery is low. This little guy is a life saver in so many ways.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase.  Great price for one of the best chargers on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel as it is just below the allowable level for taking on a plane. Can charge multiple cellphones and my Dell XPS at one time. The only small issue I have is how long it takes to charge. But I don’t depend on this until I need it and I make sure it’s charged before I leave for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many other portable chargers in the past, but I’d say that this one takes the cake. It’s best to charge it with a 12 watt or higher wall adapter or else you’ll be waiting awhile to charge it completely. Once it is charged though, I go quite a few days without needing to plug it in again. Taking it to school is great, same with traveling. No complaints from me. If you need a reliable portable charger and you’re interested in this one, go for it. One more thing, it turns on automatically when you plug in a wire to charge another device and also turns off on its own when the device is done charging.
customer_reviews.author: Roland

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Supply
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying RAV for years. Own two multi output ports and bought several battery backup units for family and myself. Be careful to not keep anything plugged in while not using as the connectors can be damaged if banged on.
customer_reviews.author: GAS

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy, but I can't imagine traveling without it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of power packs in my time and can say that this is probably one of the best ones I have ever used! The battery life is phenomenal! I wish I could say how many things I could charge off of a single charge on this thing, but honestly, I don't remember because I forget to keep track. Lifesaver while I was traveling around Spain and american-style plugs were not easily accessible
customer_reviews.author: Raul Perez

customer_reviews.title: Charges Dell XPS 9365 via USB C
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable battery that was capable of charging my Dell XPS 13 9365 via USB C and this one does it. Very satisfied with the build quality and the included cables too. It looks promising but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Bank! Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome portable charger! I purchased one for myself as well as one for my sister. I was able to charge my iPhone and my Apple Watch several times before having to recharge the power bank itself. I also charged my MacBook Pro with it! It didn’t charge to full capacity, but it gave enough power that I was able to finish my work! It’s light weight and comes with several charging cords as well as a mesh case. I would definitely buy this item again. It works incredibly well and is fairy inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: You just need to hold the button on the battery pack for like 5 second to reverse the effect
customer_reviews.text: I have the QC 3.0 version but due to incompatibility with Essential phone I bought this charger. The battery pack charges quick and also charges Essential phone in rapid mode. Just be careful on first use, When I first tried to charge it, the phone was charging the battery pack instead. You just need to hold the button on the battery pack for like 5 second to reverse the effect.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro Morikawa

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a better powerbank until now. This one has 2 usb ports and 1 usb-c port. I use my Nintendo Switch charger to fast charge it... and it charges it in mind blowing speed! Charges everything I use multiple times and lasts weeks on a single charge. This is my go to product when I'm traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M

customer_reviews.title: great capacity good price but doesn't work with my razer ...
customer_reviews.text: great capacity good price but doesn't work with my razer blade stealth not even in sleep mode it just disconnects after 2 minutes and the battery meter just blinks like the battery is from the laptop! going to have to find another solution!
customer_reviews.author: Benny Benabe

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised for a Moto G5 Plus
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream, so far. Was quick to charge when I first got it. Took about 4ish hours total, but then I don't have the PD-value wall socket, so it should be faster next time. I've used it to charge my Moto G5 Plus. I've timed it compared to my usual fast-charging official cable and this Charger out-paced it by 20 minutes, even if it didn't give the "Turbo Power" charging notification. I'll give this bad boy a shot on my Nintendo Switch later and post the results.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: It works as I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack does what I wanted. It charges my Dell Inspiron 13 7000 series (7378) via USB-C port just fine. Everything works as advertised. USB-C port on the battery appears to be a little cheaply adhered, so I hope it lasts a long time. No issues yet, though i've been trying to be gentle with it.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: so good. Ill update with any issues
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use it much yet. Battery life on my phone lasts for about 2 days. Connects to my phone and initiates "turbo power" fast charge. Doesn't seem to charge at the speed of the turbo wall adapted, but it still charges faster than non-quick charge. I basically bought this to keep in the car for emergencies. It comes with a multitude of connectors. So far, so good. Ill update with any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Heff

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel, and all purpose needs!
customer_reviews.text: We recently took short 3-days trip to Reno, but need to work while on short vacation! This 1 power bank was sufficient to charge my Macbook Pro (spec. at 65watts, but no problem charging at 30 watts), ipad pro (18 watts), and iphone, my wife iphone ... and it was great that it got recharge at 30 watts, so much faster then ordinary micro usb at 10 watts! Will buy another one, since this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Deric Do

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Broke in less than a week and can’t even charge my laptop like they claim. This battery pack is a lie and terrible for travel use. I am always on the road for work and needed a reliable charger. This pack is not reliable at all!
customer_reviews.author: ChefLiu

customer_reviews.title: Deal with the weight for max battery life
customer_reviews.text: It’s heavy but what do you expect for a lot of power and u can travel with it and it has usb c charging and powering ur device fast. 2 usb slots it’s worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Cybertime0110

customer_reviews.title: Cost was misleading
customer_reviews.text: The cost says $59.99 but when it's invoiced it showed $66 so that was not truthful. I am not happy about the advertisement of cost not being accurate.
customer_reviews.author: SM Review

customer_reviews.title: Shutting down after 30 minutes and does not charge. Pressing button resume charging stops again
customer_reviews.text: After 6 month of rear use it stop charging devices after 30 minutes, even though it has full power (all lights are lit on power indicator). Once I press button, it start charging again and then again, shutting down.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Vorkunov

customer_reviews.title: Won't charge a running laptop + usb devices simultaneously
customer_reviews.text: I've been waiting forever for a PD type battery to hit the market as I'm a remote working software dev, regularly in situations where I may not have access to an outlet for my late 2016 macbook pro. It charges my laptop at roughly half the speed of the wall adaptor, that said, when it's plugged into my laptop it refuses to charge any USB devices while the laptop is running. If I put the laptop to sleep everything does charge, but the moment I wake the laptop the other devices stop charging.
customer_reviews.author: Beau J. Randall

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 2 DAYS OF USE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working literally after the first use. Won't take a charge and USB-C only low output - EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kaimowitz

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect weight on both the powerbank and the recommended Plug.
customer_reviews.text: It might not be a big deal for some, but as a Thru-hiker weight is very important to me. The list weight is 13.3 oz. The actual weight of the powerbank is 16.5 oz. This might not seem like a lot, however with the recommended plug which is supposed to weigh 0.6 oz according to the listing and actually weighs 3.6 oz. Adding the cords and it's about an 8 oz difference than what they listed. Which is half a lb. For a hiker that is a LOT of weight and certainly would have made me choose something different.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: Prett good, bought to charge laptop though and after purchase, was sent a list of "incompatible" devices, which included my laptop. Seems like somthing they could have put in the description
customer_reviews.author: K Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great! But..
customer_reviews.text: The only difficulty I have had is charging the pack itself. Also tip: make sure to press the button to initiate charging any devices. It took me forever to figure that out.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Beaver

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a beast
customer_reviews.text: Will charge your iPhone more times than you can count, and it does it fast and cool. Absolute upgrade over earlier models.
customer_reviews.author: Filmlover2008

customer_reviews.title: A Beast
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. It provided all the power two of us needed for long days travelling for a conference. Given the amount of power stored it is quite reasonably sized. It also charges super fast and recharges fast when using USB-C.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J Huning

customer_reviews.title: started failing a few weeks in
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a while and I was impressed. Then, I noticed it would only charge my iphone half way or my notebook to 17% on full charge, despite having been able to charge them well prior. I try charging it fully thinking that might be the issue, but it always indicated the charge is full.
customer_reviews.author: Flavian

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two good years - expected more
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for its PD capabilities, which served me well as a road warrior with a job that requires I always be on my PD charged macbook. This was until the PD USB C port broke internally. Now the device is largely useless unless I go in and soldier it back. What makes this purchase worse is the constant, weekly emails from the seller "asking" for a better review without warrant and/or for me to be comp'ed to delete the review.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good value, some hiccups
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for money, Easily tops up my MacBook and other USB C ultrabooks I have from ASUS and Razer. I did not give it five stars because the USB C to USB C included cable could not handle throughput to my laptops but could to my Galaxy S8 +.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great with my Nintendo switch and Galaxy Note 9
customer_reviews.text: 8 hours in the car. Kept by Note 9 and Nintendo Switch both well fed and happy. Oh yeah, I was entertained too...
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon's Folly

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind on a long flight, probably more than you need.
customer_reviews.text: This worked excellently for my Nintendo Switch on a long flight. I was able to play Zelda at about 50 percent brightness for a solid 12+ hours, while also fully charging an iPhone 8+ twice, and the battery still had some juice yet. The USB-C quickcharge for the battery itself works very well, although it requires a separate wall adapter (about 10 bucks from RAVPower as well).
customer_reviews.author: harris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Nintendo Switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for my Nintendo Switch, because I fly across the country every 2-4 months for work. I just got done with my trip and the battery was a life saver. I had 6 hours of flight time that I was using the battery and it still had juice left.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Pinney

customer_reviews.title: Type C stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted less than a year. It began to have problems recognizing the USB C port. I would need to connect and disconnect the cable from the USB-c port for my phone to recognize it. A couple weeks ago, it stopped working out of nowhere. Now it won't receive a charge or charge through the USBC port. So much for fast charging. I have tried to call the company (Rav Power) but they never seem to answer the phone. Edit: Customer service replied and sent me a new Rav power bank. So far it is working great. They have also shown amazing customer service and i am thankful for it
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Espana

customer_reviews.title: Charges my Lenovo Yoga 720 13"
customer_reviews.text: Charges my Lenovo Yoga 720 13" (7th generation) with no issues. Charges a little slower than the actual outlet charger since this is only 30W whereas the Lenovo charger does 45W. The fabric pouch is kind of falling apart with minimal usage, but that's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Yoon

customer_reviews.title: Not working with type c lightning iphone 11 pro max
customer_reviews.text: Plug in type c to lightning cable (ip11pro original cable) charge for 1 second then off itself. Trash! Updated: seller contact me for a 60 dollars gift card. I feel better now.
customer_reviews.author: Rex

product_meta.title: Portable Charger RAVPower 26800mAh 30W PD USB C Power Bank High-Capacity Power Delivery External Battery Pack with Fast Recharged for MacBook Air iPad iPhone11 Pro SE S10 Nintendo Switch (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackNote:
1. NOT Compatible with Macbook Pro-13-2017/Google Pixel Book
2. The battery pack will charge your laptop once after connected. However if it is recharged from the laptop, please long hold the power button for 5 seconds to reverse the charging
3. Incompatible with HTC 10 and HP Spectre and Dell XPS 13
4. Will not charge MacBook Pro, Samsung W700 or Lumia 950 at full speed
5. Press the Power Button before connecting your device to activate USB-C output
6. Nintendo Switch will not charge when connected via HDMI

Max Power with Max Capacity
At a total 26800mAh, it can fully charge an iPhone 7 over 9 times, for iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6 Plus or Galaxy S7 over six times, for iPhone 6 ten whole times or an iPad Air 2 times- that’s enough power to last an entire trip.

RAVPower iSmart Charging Technology
Both ports include iSmart charging technology which automatically detects a connected device, identifies the charging input, then matches the devices with its required current. Advanced Panasonic IC chipset makes both safer and more efficient.

Compatibility Phone Model: Nintendo Switch/iPhone SE/iPhone 11/11 Pro / 11 Pro Max/iPhone XS / XS Max / XR / X / 8 Plus / 8 / 7 / 7 Plus / 6 / Samsung Galaxy S10 / S10e / S10+ /S9 / S9+ / S8 / S8+ / Note 9 / Note 8 / Huawei P10 / Mate 9 / Mate 20X / Mate 20 Pro LG G7 / V30+ / Google Pixel / Pixel 3a / XL / 3 / 2XL / 2 iPad Pro 12 9’’ / iPad Pro 10 5’’ / iPad Pro 11

Specification
Micro USB Input: DC 5V/2A
Type-C Input: DC 5V/3A,9V/2A,15V/2A,20V/1.5A
Type-C Output: DC 5V/3A,9V/2A,15V/2A,20V/1.5A
iSmart USB Output: DC 5V/3.4A Total(Each 2.4A Max)
What’s In the Box:
1 x RAVPower 26800mAh Portable Charger (Model: RP-PB058)
1 x RAVPower Type-C to C Cable
1 x 2 Micro-USB Cables
1 x Travel Pouch
1 x User Manual
feature_bullets: Capable of charging a Nintendo Switch while it is being played. The Only USB PD Portable Charger Up To 30W: Recharge the 26800mAh battery through the Type-C port in just 4-5 hours (compared to the standard 14 hours); also features 2A and 1A input recharging. Note: Type-C charger sold separately. Type-C port is incompatible with the Type-C cable or charger of Huawei P10, Huawei mate9 as well as all OPPO & One Plus phone
Massive 30W Type-C Output: The Type-C output reaches up to 30W that matches the original AC MacBook charger, so you can charge all devices including a MacBook in no time

Large Capacity, Multiple Outputs: 26800mAh battery capacity approximately charges an iPhone 11 Pro Max 4 times, a Samsung S10 5.3 times, or an iPad Pro 1.5 times; contains two 2. 4A iSmart ports for a combined 3. 4A total
Advanced iSmart 2. 0 Technology: Upgraded iSmart 2. 0 automatically detects and adjusts the charging current to obtain the fastest charging; advanced Panasonic IC for safer and better conductivity
Safety First: A+ battery for over 500 charge / recharge cycles; includes overcharge, short circuit, and current surge protection; features a scratch resistant matte finish

Compatible devices: iPhone 11 Pro Max,iPhone 11 Pro,iPhone 11,Nintendo Switch,iPhone XR,XS, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 7, iPhone 6, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone 5, iPhone 5s, iPhone 5c, iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad Air 2, iPad mini, iPad mini 2, iPad mini 4, iPhone X

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,592 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
